LanguageData.ID_Introspection.label: introspection
LanguageData.ID_Introspection.beginletter: {0} has just been inspired. [PAWN_pronoun] will learn 2 times faster for the next 48 hours.
LanguageData.ID_ManaRegen.label: mana regeneration
LanguageData.ID_ManaRegen.beginletter: {0} has just been inspired. [PAWN_pronoun] will gain mana 2 times faster for the next 72 hours.
LanguageData.ID_Outgoing.label: outgoing
LanguageData.ID_Outgoing.beginletter: {0} has just been inspired. [PAWN_pronoun] will be more socially active and will be more likely to have positive social interactions for the next 24 hours.
LanguageData.ID_MiningFrenzy.label: mining frenzy
LanguageData.ID_MiningFrenzy.beginletter: {0} has just been inspired. [PAWN_pronoun] will mine 50% faster and yield 50% more resources during mining for the next 72 hours.
LanguageData.ID_FarmingFrenzy.label: farming frenzy
LanguageData.ID_FarmingFrenzy.beginletter: {0} has just been inspired. [PAWN_pronoun] will harvest crops 50% faster with 50% more yield during plant cutting jobs for the next 72 hours.
LanguageData.ID_Champion.label: champion
LanguageData.ID_Champion.beginletter: {0} has been heroically inspired. [PAWN_pronoun] dreams of being the champion in the stories told by bards and will live up to those expectations for the next 72 hours.
LanguageData.ID_Enlightened.label: enlightened
LanguageData.ID_Enlightened.beginletter: {0} has entered a period of enlightenment. [PAWN_pronoun] consciousness will be significantly expanded for the next 72 hours.
